Articles.Content:
I don't know why, but none of my RCS thrusters will work unless they're configured with stock Monopropellant. Some of them don't work at all. Is there any fix for this? I don't believe the issue is mod confliction, as they were working fine until a day or so ago. And for whatever reason, time runs at half speed.

Modlist:

Toolbar

Active Texture Management

AIES Aerospace

Advanced Jet Engines

B9 Aerospace

Soviet Engines

City Lights and Clouds

BTEngines

Custom Biomes

Deadly Reentry

Kerbal Engineer

E.V.E.

Ferram Aerospace

Inflatable Habitats

Hyomoto

RastorPropMonitor

K.A.S.

Planet Factory

Procedural Fairings

K.J.R.

KOSMOS

KW Rocketry

ELCSS Life Support

HotRockets

Realism Overhaul

Real Solar System

RemoteTech 2

SCANsat

SFJB Real Engines

Universe Replacer

Edited June 7, 2014 by Bluechance

Anything except monopropellant requires fuel crossfeed between the fuel source and the thruster.

Also, you're not listing Real Fuels in your mod list. Realism Overhaul requires it...

And your problem with the game running at half speed is you are running out of RAM or bogging down your CPU with some kind of conflict somewhere. You may want to open your ALT+F2 to check and see what is happenning when the game is slowing down.
